Changelog
=========

0.4 - (2010-01-25)
------------------

* Fixed document, event, newsitem and topic extenders (missing primary field markers)

0.3 - (2010-01-21)
------------------

* Fixed file, image and link extenders (missing primary field markers)

0.2 - (2009-12-02)
------------------

* Added README.txt

0.1 - (2009-10-30)
------------------

* Initial release
